```{r}
discrete <- function(x, p_x, create_plot=FALSE){

  # cumulative distribution function of X
  F_x <- cumsum(p_x)
  
  if (create_plot == TRUE) {
    print(x)
    print(p_x)
    #ar(mfrow = c(1, 2))

    plot(p_x, lwd = 3, type = 'h', main = 'pmf of X', ylab = 'p(x)', xlab = 'x')

    cdf <- stepfun(x, c(0, F_x))
    plot.stepfun(cdf, verticals = FALSE, do.points = TRUE, 
      pch = 16, lwd = 3,
      main = 'cdf of X',
      ylab = 'F(x)')
  }
  
  list(
    E_X <- c(x %*% p_x),
    Var_X <- c(x - E_X)^2 %*% p_x,
    F_X <- F_x
  )
}
```

```{r}
X <- 1:5
P_X <- rep(0.2, 5)
df <- discrete(x=X, p_x=P_X, TRUE)
```
